thread.title: HighPoint Global Names New Chief Human Resources Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: HighPoint Global Names New Chief Human Resources Officer
text:
Reston, VA, Feb. 22, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HighPoint Global®, the citizen experience company TM , today announced the appointment of Kristen Mullins to its executive team as Chief Human Resources Officer. In this role, Mullins will lead HighPoint’s continual efforts to build an elite team of citizen experience professionals. Mullins will be responsible for directing all people functions of the organization including compensation, performance management, employee relations, recruitment, and benefits.
“We value our people as the most important key to our success in supporting our customers’ mission. It is vital that we continue to not only bring in excellent people, but continue to develop and cultivate strong employee experiences,” said HighPoint CEO, Ben Lanius. “Kristen’s proven expertise will take our organization to the next level as we continue to grow our business and our people.”
Mullins is an industry veteran, with 17 years of experience in government contracting organizations. She most recently served as Vice President of Human Resources at Oceus Networks. She has also held senior-level human resources roles at Grant Thornton LLP and BTG, Inc.
“HighPoint’s positive culture and vision to elevate the citizen experience excites me and I am thrilled to join a passionate team,” commented Mullins. “I am looking forward to building on the amazing culture to provide a great experience for our employees and positioning the company as an employer of choice.”
Mullins is a SHRM Senior Certified Professional, Global Remuneration Professional, Certified Compensation Professional, and Global Professional in Human Resources. She holds a Bachelor of Arts in Political Science from the University of Mary Washington and a Master of Science in Administration from Central Michigan University.
About HighPoint Global
HighPoint Global helps government agencies elevate the citizen experience TM by improving the touchpoints through which citizens interact with government. From contact centers and employee experience to digital and data services, our team works with government agencies to more efficiently integrate the people, processes and technology that help government deliver on the needs of citizens and employees. HighPoint delivers services for 15 government clients including the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, Office of the Comptroller of Currency, Department of State, Defense Logistics Agency and Department of Housing and Urban Development.
HighPoint is a privately held company founded in 2006 with 350 employees across offices in Indianapolis, Indiana; Baltimore, Maryland; and Reston and Herndon, Virginia. For additional information about HighPoint, visit www.highpointglobal.com .
